page.title: 10 Great Haseley Sunday School
page.content:
A Report From The Haseleys Sunday School is held at 10.30a.m. each Sunday after the morning service,except the first Sunday each month,when there is a childrens at 9.30a.m. We will be taking a short break during the Summer,so the last Sunday School for the Summer will be on Sunday July 28th.We will be back for the autumn term on September 8th 10.30a.m. We are having a picnic tea, come along and join us on Sunday July 28th between 3-5p.m.on the Recreation Ground.Please bring your own picnic plus your mums and dads if possible and we will provide the fun and games for you to enjoy.
by Sunday School Mums
